name: Full Electric Hospital Bed
descr:
Full deluxe electric hospital bed.

Can be fit the monkey pole or I. V. pole on the bed. High quality wodden side panel. 4" wheels with brake. Head/Foot elevating. High/Low elevating. Left/Right elevating. Remote control to operate all functions. Weight capacity 250 kg.

Specifications: Lenght: 200 cm. Width: 90 cm.
